Generated Narrative: ValueSet encounter-class-vs

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/R4
    CodeDisplay
    AMBAmbulatory
    IMPInpatient
    OBSENCObservation
    EMEREmergency
    VRVirtual
    HHHome Health
  • Include these codes as defined in http://github.com/BIH-CEI/RareLink
    CodeDisplay
    RDCRD Specialist Center
  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    261665006Unknown
